sections.heading: Observances; not paid holidays
sections.text: The observances provided for in sections 84-104.05, 84-104.08, 84-104.09, 84-107, and 84-108 shall not include provisions for such days to be declared paid holidays pursuant to subsection (3) of section 84-1001.SourceLaws 1991, LB 199, ยง 2.
